name: Aurra by Virtuals
description: AurraCloud (AURA) is a AI Agent Tooling & MCP hosting platform, specifically focused on Crypto use cases. Using Aurra you can build and deploy AI agents in minutes, integrate it into Telegram or discord, easily enable or disable agent toolkits from our App, all with 0 coding required. for MCP clients like claude or cursor we have crypto MCP tooling, so you can use all the agents and their capabilities directly into your existing workflows.
